change_history.change:
Soul was revamped and renamed to Spirit.
[Z] Soul Snatcher was renamed to [Z] Frostfire Grasp.
[C] Outraged Raijin was renamed to [C] Wrath of Shu.
Spirit users now get buddies overtime instead of getting them from NPCs or Players.

Soul received a balancing.
Changes on how Soul works:
The size of [X] Wrath of Ra now scales with the blue bar.
The damage of [C] Outraged Raijin now scales with the red bar.
Nerfed base stats of both moves.
Rebalanced dashes and run speed on all the races. The speed gap between Rabbit and other races shouldn't be that huge anymore.
Character gravity now slowly increases the further away the user is from the ground, to avoid sky camping.

Soul was buffed.
Reduced cooldowns on [X] Wrath of Ra, [C] Outraged Raijin, [F] Sky Ruler, and summoning buddies.
[X] Wrath of Ra and [C] Outraged Raijin now have the same cooldown duration.
[Z] Soul Snatcher can now steal up to 2 souls (spirit/buddies) by hitting multiple enemies at once.
Slightly increased the mood damage modifier on the [V] End of Times move.
Buffed the damage and hitbox on [C] Outraged Raijin.

Soul was nerfed.
The damage of [X] Wrath of Ra was reduced.
Barrier was made unavailable to purchase from the Blox Fruit Dealer's stock and Shop.

Yeti was nerfed.
Yeti's damage got reduced slightly.
Nerfed Z move range.
The X move can now be dodged by Instinct if the boulder directly hits in the air.
Nerfed C move range.
Nerfed defense buff to 35% instead of 50%.

Yeti was released.
Yeti's damage was buffed.
Revive was revamped and renamed to Ghost.
Falcon was made unavailable to purchase from the Blox Fruit Dealer's stock and Shop.
Increased passive defense from 7.5% to 10%. (This passive is currently not working.)
Spirit Fruit's model's icon was remade.

Soul was revamped and renamed to Spirit.
[Z] Soul Snatcher was renamed to [Z] Frostfire Grasp.
[C] Outraged Raijin was renamed to [C] Wrath of Shu.
Spirit users now get Buddies overtime instead of getting them from NPCs or Players.

Soul received a balancing.
Changes on how Soul works:
The size of [X] Wrath of Ra now scales with the blue bar.
The damage of [C] Outraged Raijin now scales with the red bar.
Nerfed base stats of both moves.
Rebalanced dashes and run speed on all the races. The speed gap between Rabbit and other races should not be that huge anymore.
Character gravity now slowly increases the further away the user is from the ground, to avoid sky camping.

Soul was buffed.
Reduced cooldowns on [X] Wrath of Ra, [C] Outraged Raijin, [F] Sky Ruler, and summoning buddies.
[X] Wrath of Ra and [C] Outraged Raijin now have the same cooldown duration.
[Z] Soul Snatcher can now steal up to 2 souls (spirit/buddies) by hitting multiple enemies at once.
Slightly increased the mood damage modifier on the [V] End of Times move.
Buffed the damage and hitbox on [C] Outraged Raijin.

Soul was nerfed.
The damage of [X] Wrath of Ra was reduced.
Venom Fruit's model's icon was remade.
Transformation now costs 20% of the user's Fury Meter.
Patched the infinite Fury Meter with Venom glitch.

Control was buffed.
[Z] Control Area now lasts longer.
Lowered cooldown on [X] Levitate and [F] Teleport.
Increased the damage of [V] Gamma Rush, and it no longer shrinks after catching a player, and doesn't disappear after the move.

Control was buffed.
Increased the damage of [X] Levitate

Control was buffed.
Increased the stun on [C] Echo Knife.
Slightly increased damage on [V] Gamma Rush.

Control was buffed.
Decreased the end-lag on [C] Echo Knife.
Added short immunity frames to the user while teleporting with [C] Door Gateway.
[C] Piercing Clothesline now needs to hit a player or an Enemy to activate.

[C] Piercing Clothesline
Automatically activates the skill even if it doesn't hit anyone.
Now adjusts to the user's Aura color.
[X] Pastry River was nerfed. (Lost the auto aim ability and hit more targets)

Dough received a slight buff.
Slightly reduced the delay on [V] Restless Dough Barrage.
Slightly increased the hitbox on [X] Sticky Dough and [C] Carved Dough.

Dough was released as a special Natural-type Blox Fruit.
Dough had Elemental Reflex passive but required the user to have Instinct on.
Mammoth's hitbox was broken for a brief amount of time, allowing users to stand in water and survive as the hitbox was just slightly above the water. This has been fixed in a later hotfix.

2025-07-04:
Pain was made unavailable to purchase from the Blox Fruit Dealer's stock and Shop.

Paw was renamed to Pain.
[Z] Heavy Paw was renamed to [Z] Heavy Pain.
[X] Paw Barrage was renamed to [X] Pain Barrage.
[C] Paw Nuke was renamed to [C] Pain Nuke.
Blur background visual for entering [C] World Warp was changed back to the former visuals.
Removed the ability to stay in [X] Parallel Escape while using M1s, as well as slightly decreasing the total time of the move.
Added a blur background visual when entering a portal formed by [C] World Warp.
Players now have to close the screen of fruit shop in order to use the GUI of [C] World Warp.
Portal's M1 can no longer be used when talking to an NPC.
Enemies now gain approximately 60 invincibility frames when being forced out of [V] Dimensional Rift, effectively removing its ability to infinite combo.
Slightly increased cooldown of [V] Dimensional Rift and [X] Parallel Escape.

Door was reworked and was renamed to Portal.
[Z] Spinning Door was renamed to [Z] Portal Dash.
[X] Dimensional Door was renamed to [X] Parallel Escape.
[C] Door Gateway was renamed to [C] World Warp.
Added [V] Dimensional Rift.
[F] Hallway was renamed to [F] Quantum Leap.
Added short immunity frames to the user while teleporting with [C] Door Gateway.

2025-07-18:
Rumble was made unavailable to purchase from the Blox Fruit Dealer's stock and Shop.
[V] Thunderball Destruction (V2) now fires faster and deals reduced knockback.
Improved the visual effects on some Rumble V2 abilities.
The awakened version was severely nerfed.
[X] moves's heal in V1 form costs more energy to keep the recovery rate with V2.

String was renamed to Spider.
[Z] Rainbow String (V1) was renamed to "Spider Wraith".
[F] String Path (V1) was renamed to "Spider Path".
[F] God's Highway (V2) was renamed to "Spider Highway".
All moves were reworked (with the exception of awakened [X] and [Z]).
Greatly increased the auto-aim and speed on the C move unawakened.

Barrier was reworked and renamed to Creation.
[M1] ability was added.
[Z] Barrier Wall was replaced by [Z] Batter Up.
[X] Surprise Attack was replaced by [X] Sleight of Hand.
[C] Barrier Prison was replaced by [C] Sword Box
[V] Barrier Towers was enhanced to become [V] Magic City.
[F] Stairs was enhanced to become [F] Fortify.
Creation's rarity was changed from Rare to Legendary.
Barrier was made unavailable to purchase from the Blox Fruit Dealer's stock and Shop. (Price in trading remains the same)
Buddha V1 received a slightly higher Air Jump (around 1.5x) compared to untransformed.
Awakened Buddha's abilities damage were buffed.

While transformed, the damage of swords' M1 was nerfed.
Human: Buddha users now deal 27.5% decreased M1 damage, only in PvP.
Gravity was remade available to purchase.

Gravity Fruit's model was slightly remade again.
The color of the fruit model became darker.
The pink ring now rotates around the fruit.

All moves were reworked.
[Z] Gravity Push was renamed to [Z] Singularity.
[X] Gravity Obeisance was renamed to [X] Orbital Chain.
[C] Meteor Pitch was renamed to [C] Gravitational Prison.
[V] Meteors Rain was renamed to [V] Asteroid Crash.
[F] Boulder Flight was renamed to [F] Shooting Star.
Previous IconPrevious Inventory IconOld Gravity Fruit's model.Gravity Push (Old)Gravity Obeisance (Old)Meteor Pitch (Old)Meteors Rain (Old)Boulder Flight (Old)
Gravity was made unavailable to purchase from the Blox Fruit Dealer's stock and Shop.

Gravity was reworked.
Every ability got a VFX rework.
Old: [V] Meteors Rain could not be aimed and used to hit randomly.
New: [V] Meteors Rain can be aimed.

Love was nerfed.
[X] Cupid's Zone no longer has infinite range.

Besto Friendo could jump, dash, and swim.
Also, it un-aggroed when you didn't have any tools selected.

Love's price was increased.
Rare -> Legendary
  700,000 ->   1,300,000
  1,150 ->   1,700

All moves were reworked.
[Z] Mellowing Heart was renamed to [Z] Heart Shot.
[X] Arrow of Imprisonment was renamed to [X] Cupid's Zone.
[V] Scented Kicks was renamed to [V] Besto Friendo.
Love was released as a Rare Blox Fruit.

Awakened Quake was nerfed.
Slightly reduced damage.
Added some end-lag to [Z] Fatal Demolisher (V2).
[X] Air Crusher and [C] Spatial Shockwave (V2) has a longer wind up.
Decreased the hitbox and speed of [X] Air Crusher (V2).
Decreased the cooldown of [V] Dual Tsunami.
Decreased the cooldown of [V] Dual Tsunami.
The animation of [V] Transformation was changed.

[V] Transformation was buffed.
Energy regeneration was decreased to 25% instead of 50%.
Rubber was reworked and its visuals were enhanced.
Aura now works properly on Rubber.

Rubber was nerfed.
Rubber's 2nd Transformation's damage boost is now 22.5% instead of 25%.

Rubber was buffed.
Added immunity to Electric fighting style and Rumble.
Enlarged the Aura visual with Rubber.

Awakened Sand was nerfed.
Re-balanced the general damage.
[X] Sand coffin now stuns the user for 1.8s after a successful grab.
Fast Mode now reduces the particle on [Z] Desert Blade and [V] Deep Sand to reduce lag.

Sand was released.
Sand also received a slight buff after the release.
Buffed the damage and the hitbox of [X] Desert Funeral.

Diamond was nerfed.
[Z] Encrust's defense was reduced from 25% to 23%.
[X] Shard Storm's damage got slightly reduced.
[C] Shimmering Disruption no longer stuns enemies.
[V] Prismatic Reflection now can be dodged by Instinct and its AoE was reduced.

All moves were reworked.
[X] Beaming Tackle was renamed to [X] Shard Storm.
[C] Diamond Hail was renamed to [C] Shimmering Disruption.
[V] Solar Flare was renamed to [V] Prismatic Reflection.

Revive was revamped and renamed to Ghost.
Ghost's rarity was changed from Uncommon to Rare.
Revive was released as an Uncommon Blox Fruit.

Awakened:
User can walk on water.
The Magma balls (big version of Scorching Puddles) deal way higher tick damage.
Slightly buffed explosion damage on [Z].
The [C] move can ignore Instinct.
Reduced the range of the [Z] move Awakened.
Magma's visuals were reworked and/or enhanced.
Light's sword was replaced by a spear.

All moves were reworked.
Unawakened:
[Z] Light Beam was renamed to [Z] Light Ray.
[X] Light Barrage was renamed to [X] Barrage of Light.
[C] Light Kick was renamed to [C] Reflection Kick.

[X] Swords of Judgement (V2) was buffed.
The range of the projectiles was increased.
Now ignores Instinct.
Light's visuals were reworked and/or enhanced.
The speed of the flight move is now relative to the user's current health. (Example: 50% health = 50% speed; caps at 40% speed)
Light's sword is no longer a move, but a passive click ability (M1), and a new [V] move have been made in place of it.

Dark was nerfed.
The hitbox of [X] Abyssal Darkness (V2) was reduced.

All Smoke's moves were reworked.
[Z] Smoke Cloud was renamed to [Z] Smoke Slam.
[X] Smoke Pull was renamed to [X] Smoke Blast.
[C] Smoke Tackle was renamed to [C] Smoke Liberation.
[F] Smoke Flight was renamed to [F] Smoke Bomber.

All moves were reworked and added new moves.
[Z] Rush was renamed to [Z] Spike Summon.
[X] Spiky Ball was renamed [X] Whirlwind and moved to [C] Spiky Ball.
Increased damage of the [X] Spiky Ball move.

The visuals of Ice's skills were revamped.
Ice's sword was replaced by a trident.

Ice was buffed.
The speed and stun of [C] Frozen Dragon (V2) were increased.
The stun time of [V] Absolute Zero (V2) was extended.

Ice was nerfed.
The ability to use [V] Absolute Zero in air was removed.
Added freezing water mechanic to [Z] Ice Spears.

All moves were reworked.
[Z] Snipe was renamed to [Z] Targeted Bomb.
[X] Ultimate Explosion was renamed to [X] Bomb Grab.
Lowered cooldown on both Bomb and Spike.
Reworked and/or Enhanced visuals of the Bomb move.

Chop was reworked and renamed to Blade.
Added a [TAP] ability.
[Z] Tackle was renamed to [Z] Razor Cyclone.
[X] Dance was renamed to [X] Blade Dance.
[C] Party was renamed to [C] Saw Shredder.
[F] Helicopter was renamed to [F] Turbine Flight.

Spin was reworked.
Changed Spin's icon and reverted back to the old icon.
Buffed the Fury Meter gain from landing skills on base or hybrid mode.

Nerfed Dragon with the changes seen below:
Reduced the fury meter gain from landing skills on transformation.
Reduced transformed damage resistance from 60% to 53%.
Increase cooldowns for all moves (+0.5 seconds on each move).
Reduced damage of all moves (-5% on each move).
Slightly decreased Western Dragon transformation's flight speed.
Dragon was remade available to purchase.

Dragon was reworked into two versions: Western and Eastern.
Added Dragon's Hybrid Form.
Added an M1 attack.
[Z] Heatwave Beam was renamed to [Z] Heatwave Cannon.
[X] Draconic Claw was renamed to [X] Infernal Pincer.
[C] Fire Shower was renamed to [C] Scorching Downfall.
[V] Transformation was renamed to [V] Imperial Evolution.
[F] Dragon Flight was renamed to [F] Draconic Soar.

Dragon was made unavailable to purchase from the Blox Fruit Dealer and Shop.
Its price was changed to "IN PROGRESS".
It started getting reworked.
Dragon Fruit's model icon was remade.

[C] Fire Shower and [X] Dragonic Claw were reworked.
Fire Shower's hitbox was reduced.
Both of these abilities got a small VFX rework.

Falcon was reworked and renamed to Eagle.
[TAP] Normal Attack was added.
[Z] Plumage was replaced by [Z] Wind Burst.
[X] Wind Burst was moved to the [Z] move and replaced by [X] Feather Storm.
Eagle was made available to purchase.
Falcon was made unavailable to purchase from the Blox Fruit Dealer's stock and Shop.
Increased passive defense from 7.5% to 10%. (This passive never worked.)
Flame was buffed damage was added on all moves, [V] move received more consistent tick damage
Awakened and Unawakened Flame received a slight rework.

Awakened Flame was buffed slightly.
[F] Rocket Flight now has a higher initial speed boost.
Increased the damage of [Z] Blue Fire Bullets. Additionally, it grows in size as it travels.
Made some of Flame's moves cast faster.
Transformed Kitsune's speed was severely nerfed, but then later got buffed to be slightly slower than its original speed.
